00014 Decider80211MultiChannel::Decider80211MultiChannel(DeciderToPhyInterface* phy,
00015           double threshold,
00016           double sensitivity,
00017           double decodingCurrentDelta,
00018           int currentChannel,
00019           int myIndex,
00020           bool debug):

00030 void Decider80211MultiChannel::getChannelInfo(simtime_t_cref start, simtime_t_cref end, AirFrameVector& out) const
00031 {
00032   Decider80211Battery::getChannelInfo(start, end, out);
00033 
00034   for (AirFrameVector::iterator it = out.begin(); it != out.end(); ) {
00035     if((*it)->getChannel() != currentChannel) {
00036       it = out.erase(it);
00037     }
00038     else
00039       ++it;
00040   }
00041 }
00042 
00043 simtime_t Decider80211MultiChannel::processNewSignal(AirFrame* frame) {
00044   if(frame->getChannel() != currentChannel)
00045     return notAgain;
00046 
00047   return Decider80211Battery::processNewSignal(frame);
00048 }
00049 
00050 DeciderResult* Decider80211MultiChannel::checkIfSignalOk(AirFrame* frame) {
00051   DeciderResult* result = 0;
00052 
00053   if(frame->getChannel() != currentChannel) {
00054     ConstMappingIterator* bitrateIt
00055         = frame->getSignal().getBitrate()->createConstIterator();
00056     bitrateIt->next(); //iterate to payload bitrate indicator
00057     double payloadBitrate = bitrateIt->getValue();
00058     delete bitrateIt;
00059     deciderEV << "Channel changed during reception. packet is lost!\n";
00060     result = new DeciderResult80211(false, payloadBitrate, 0);
00061   } else {
00062     result = Decider80211Battery::checkIfSignalOk(frame);
00063   }
00064 
00065   return result;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void Decider80211MultiChannel::channelChanged(int newChannel) {
00069   assert(1 <= currentChannel && currentChannel <= 14);
00070   currentChannel = newChannel;
00071   centerFrequency = CENTER_FREQUENCIES[currentChannel];
00072   channelStateChanged();
00073 }
